nodes.text: Tekurr'k was a planet located within the Tekurr'k system of the Mid Rim's Senex sector.
It was an industrial world, lying on the crossroads of the Belsavis Run and the Anturi Reach.

Colonized by the nobles that settled the Senex-Juvex region, the House Picutorion, the planet was built into an industrial powerhouse. By processing raw materials that the nearby planet of Atron lacked, Tekurr'k was able to make a profit by selling them off for less money. This allowed Tekurr'k to gain prominence, and their economy experienced a boom.
